## DataMapper interface

The DataMapper is used for two-way translation between input data and backend data.

E.G. Backend holds Y/N but frontend used true/false.

DataMapper has use cases: Translate text to images Translate text to html-links

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface DataMapper 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getIntermediateValue(tier)](./forms42core.datamapper.getintermediatevalue.md) | Get the value at the given tier before validated/finished |
|  [getValue(tier)](./forms42core.datamapper.getvalue.md) | Get the value at the given tier |
|  [setIntermediateValue(tier, value)](./forms42core.datamapper.setintermediatevalue.md) | Set the value at the given tier before validated/finished |
|  [setValue(tier, value)](./forms42core.datamapper.setvalue.md) | Set the value at the given tier |
